channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: These brain implants speak your mind — even when you don't want to
item.description: Brain-implanted devices that allow paralyzed people to speak can also decode words they imagine, but don't intend to share.

item.title: Nerd! How the word popularized by Dr. Seuss went from geeky insult to mainstream
item.description: Nerd has been part of our lexicon for three-quarters of a century, its geeky meaning embodied by some of the most recognizable characters in film and ...

item.title: Voting officials are leaving their jobs at the highest rate in decades
item.description: Some 2 in 5 of all the local officials who administered the 2020 election left their jobs before the 2024 cycle, new research has found.

item.title: Israeli military will call up 50,000 reservists as it plans new phase of war in Gaza
item.description: An Israeli official said that the military will be operating in parts of Gaza City where the Israeli military has not yet operated and where Hamas is ...

item.title: Trump's return to 'law and order' highlights a sore spot for Democrats: crime policy
item.description: Democrats have struggled to counter GOP efforts to frame itself as the party of "law and order." Some see it as a problem of messaging, while others t...

item.title: First domino in national redistricting fight likely to fall with Texas GOP poised for vote on maps
item.description: Texas’ Republican-led legislature is expected to approve new congressional maps that add five new House seats that the GOP could win.

item.title: Appeals court says NLRB structure unconstitutional, in a win for SpaceX
item.description: SpaceX scored a win in a decision from the Fifth Circuit over the labor board's structure.

item.title: Meta is shaking up its AI org, again
item.description: On Friday, The Information reported that Meta was preparing to tear down its existing AI org and reorganize it into four new groups. Four days later, ...

item.title: Immigrants seeking lawful work and citizenship are now subject to ‘anti-Americanism’ screening
Google pays $30M to settle lawsuit over children’s YouTube data
item.description: Google has agreed to pay $30M to settle a lawsuit over children's data collection, though the company denies wrongdoing.

item.title: Deel scores a lawsuit win, but not against Rippling
item.description: While Deel is calling this a "Rippling-aligned" suit, it's not the lawsuit filed by Rippling involving an alleged corporate spy.

item.title: Made by Google 2025: How to watch Google debut the Pixel 10, Pixel Watch 4, and more
item.description: Google is hosting its Pixel 10 event next week. Learn how to watch the tech giant reveal its new mobile devices and what else you can expect.

item.title: Even at the grocery store, Texas troopers don’t let Democrats out of sight after walkout
